mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into th_app_address (address, area, city, createTime, deleted, ip, `name`, provinces, teleNo, userId, zipCode, areaCode, cityCode, provinceCode, flag ) values (#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provincecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update th_app_address set address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinces = #{provinces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teleNo = #{teleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zipCode = #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, areaCode = #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityCode = #{citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceCode = #{provincecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, address, area, city, createTime, deleted, ip, `name`, provinces, teleNo, userId, zipCode, areaCode, cityCode, provinceCode, flag from th_app_address where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, address, area, city, createTime, deleted, ip, `name`, provinces, teleNo, userId, zipCode, areaCode, cityCode, provinceCode, flag from th_app_address
